relatedRecords.description: Welcome to New Jersey - Azure Bootcamp! All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing! relatedRecords.name: Code BEAM SF
relatedRecords.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.
